comments.body:
the script that verifies you're not getting a handle to the default mutable feature gate is dumb. I'm sorry. This will work:
```go
relevantFeatures := map[featuregate.Feature]featuregate.FeatureSpec{
	features.TokenRequest:            {Default: false},
	features.CSINodeInfo:             {Default: false},
	features.ExpandPersistentVolumes: {Default: false},
}
utilruntime.Must(trEnabledFeature.Add(relevantFeatures))
utilruntime.Must(trDisabledFeature.Add(relevantFeatures))
utilruntime.Must(csiNodeInfoEnabledFeature.Add(relevantFeatures))
utilruntime.Must(csiNodeInfoDisabledFeature.Add(relevantFeatures))

utilruntime.Must(trEnabledFeature.SetFromMap(map[string]bool{string(features.TokenRequest): true}))
utilruntime.Must(csiNodeInfoEnabledFeature.SetFromMap(map[string]bool{string(features.CSINodeInfo): true}))

```

> the script that verifies you're not getting a handle to the default mutable feature gate is dumb. I'm sorry. This will work:

Serving our true overlords, the bots.  Problem for monday.

/hold to limit ci retries
remove space since we are already up here?
Can you also test add and remove allowed labels on nodes that have forbidden labels that are unmodified?

added these test cases:
* allow update of my node: add allowed labels while forbidden labels exist unmodified
* allow update of my node: remove allowed labels while forbidden labels exist unmodified

		{
			name:       "allow update of my node: add allowed labels",
			podsGetter: existingPods,
			attributes: admission.NewAttributesRecord(setAllowedUpdateLabels(mynodeObj, ""), mynodeObj, nodeKind, mynodeObj.Namespace, mynodeObj.Name, nodeResource, "", admission.Update, false, mynode),

comments.body: Can you test update allowed labels where the value changes?

added test case:
* allow update of my node: modify allowed labels

			attributes: admission.NewAttributesRecord(mynodeObj, setAllowedUpdateLabels(mynodeObj, ""), nodeKind, mynodeObj.Namespace, mynodeObj.Name, nodeResource, "", admission.Update, false, mynode),
